name: QRNG | AI QR Code Generator
description:
QRNG is a cutting-edge parametric QR code generator designed to produce visually stunning, highly customizable QR codes. With advanced tools and functionalities, it caters to both web applications and print requirements, offering:

• High-Quality Outputs: Download QR codes in PNG (transparent background) for digital use and SVG (vector format) for graphic design and scalable printing.
• Customizable Styles: Choose from a variety of styles to match your brand’s identity or creative needs.
• Limitless Applications: Ideal for branding, graphic design, marketing, and commercial printing.

Whether you’re a designer, marketer, or business owner, QRNG combines beauty and functionality, ensuring QR codes that are both aesthetically pleasing and fully scannable across devices.
